Click to play video Play Mute Current Time  0:00 / Duration  0:50 Loaded : 12.01% 0:00 Stream Type  LIVE Seek to live, currently behind live LIVE Remaining Time  - 0:50   1x Playback Rate Chapters Chapters Descriptions descriptions off , selected Captions captions off , selected English (Automated) Audio Track default , selected Fullscreen This is a modal window. hero-video Merchant video These plastic embossing folder stencils are suitable for scrapbooks, photo albums, invitations, envelopes, DIY craft decorations. The template embossed folder is easy to be cut and removed according to your own needs, offers different clean patterns. HOW TO USE 1. Choose the appropriate size of jammed paper and put it in the embossing folder . 2.Put the embossing folder and the jammed paper into transparent plates. 3.Put it into the embossing machine and turn the operating lever. 4.Take it out and it's done. Size: 6.3" L x 4.5" W(16x11.5cm) Misting your material, especially if it is a heavy weight cardstock, with water on both sides prior to placing the material inside of your embossing folder and running it through your machine will help you achieve MAXIMUM dimension! Because of the hills and valleys or "highs and lows" of these new embossing folders, we suggest running your Sandwich through your machine a total of 3 times, for those rich, bold textures.
